title: Tin Foil Hat #67: Biological Warfare with  Jim Florentine
description:
Welcome to another fun and weird episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode the guys welcome the author of "Everyone Is Awful (Except You!), comedian Jim Florentine. This episode we discuss....
1) Jim's book "Everyone Is Awful (Except You!)"
2) The History of AIDS
3) ​T​he Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC)
4)The Black Death
5) Verily, the life sciences arm of Google'
6)Nanoweapons
7) Aaron shits all over our parade!
